title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 95.11 - Decision of hearing officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 95.11 - Decision of hearing officer

State Regulations

The hearing officer shall state his findings of fact in a written decision based upon a consideration of all the evidence in the record. The hearing officer shall file his decision with the commissioner within 30 days of the conclusion of the hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
95.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
